dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S1834 IS: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permanently extend the depreciation rules for property used predominantly within an Indian reservation.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Inhofe introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permanently extend the depreciation rules for property used predominantly within an Indian reservation.

section.header: Permanent extension of depreciation rules for property on Indian reservations

subsection.text: Subsection (j) of section 168 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking paragraph (8).
The amendment made by this section shall apply to property placed in service after December 31, 2013.
